document_data.image: [[File:Stone Giant Elders.jpg|250px|Ghunda and Thurrak, Stone giant elders]]
document_data.caption: Ghunda with Thurrak
document_data.name: Ghunda
document_data.Personality: Ghunda did not share the same reticence as others of her kind when dealing with others. She was more than willing to express her pessimistic view of the world, albeit after much thought.
